Notes: Nephew of Honorius IV ; former archbishop of Monreale ( 1278 - 1286 )

Cardinalatial title: Bishop of Porto e Santa Rufina
Notes: Former minister general of the Order of Franciscans ( 1287 - 1289 )
Former archbishop of Lyon ( 1289-1294 ) ; older brother of Bertrand de Got - future Pope Clement V ( 1305-1314 )

Cardinalatial title: Priest of SS . Silvestro e Martino
Priest of SS . Marcellino e Pietro
Priest of S. Croce in Gerusalemme

Notes: Crown-cardinal of King Charles II of Naples
Crown-cardinal of kings Philip IV of France and Charles II of Naples ; former Abbot General of his order

Cardinalatial title: Deacon of S. Maria in Portico
Notes: Relative of Cardinal Napoleone Orsini Frangipani and nephew of Pope Nicholas III ( 1277-1280 ) ; not to be confused with his grandfather , Senator Matteo Rosso Orsini ( 1178-1246 )

Cardinalatial title: Deacon of S. Maria in Via Lata

Notes: Relative of Cardinal Matteo Orsini Rosso and nephew of Pope Nicholas III ( 1277-1280 )
